Package com.coveros.training.helpers

Class ServletUtils

java.lang.Object
com.coveros.training.helpers.ServletUtils
public class ServletUtils extends Object
These helper methods help to remove duplication in the servlets. See the methods for more detail on what they do.

    • forwardToRestfulResult

      public static void forwardToRestfulResult(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, org.slf4j.Logger logger)
